Plot: While on vacation in Mexico, Chloe, a ritzy Beverly Hills chihuahua, finds herself lost and in need of assistance in order to get back home.
Title: Beverly Hills Chihuahua
Writer: Analisa LaBianco (screenplay), Jeffrey Bushell (screenplay), Jeffrey Bushell (story)
Actors: Piper Perabo, Manolo Cardona, Jamie Lee Curtis, José María Yazpik
tomatoConsensus: Despite hitting some sweet notes, Beverly Hills Chihuahua is little more than disposable family entertainment.
